ai-tha-ap255:1.2_0: aspiring to the level of the bad.
ai-tha-ap255:1.3_0: became fully extinguished in the wilderness,
ai-tha-ap255:2.1_0: and now I entered the host of gods,
ai-tha-ap255:2.4_0: and I’m just able to try.
ai-tha-ap255:3.3_0: I’m not aware of any bad places
ai-tha-ap255:4.1_0: Attaining the four kinds of textual analysis
ai-tha-ap255:5.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Bhūmajaka.
